channel.title: Error connecting to server and client loading problem
channel.description:
Hey, for some reason, Yesterday I could connect to my server. yet today I can't.
I checked to see on canyouseeme.org to see if my port was open and this is what i got...
Error: I could not see your service on (My No-ip adress) on port (43594) Reason: Connection refused
But i never changed anything... I did it fine yesterday, today It didn't work though.
Also, Second problem.
I compiled (this is when it worked) My client and server and sent it to my friend in a .rar (I uploaded it to mediafire or whatever)
when he tried to run it he got some error with Jframe or somthing. i can try and get it from him soon, but yea. I got it before, can't remember why or what happened to fix it. but im sure its common. It might have been possible he didn't extract it to his C: drive... ill have to check.

item.title: Error connecting to server and client loading problem
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Create a static Ip. Go to portforward.com, select your router and it will tell you how to create one. It’s simple and it will stop your problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Error connecting to server and client loading problem

item.title: Error connecting to server and client loading problem
item.dc:creator: @grayzai11 grayzai11
item.description:
@grayzai11 wrote:

How would i go about doing that? i tried unchecking, saving, then checking again and saving. Didn’t work.

When i do the Open port check. it shows up as my no-Ip adress… but the port forwarding is set to my regular IP. is that a problem? can someone walk me through doing it again?

Read full topic
item.source: Error connecting to server and client loading problem

item.title: Error connecting to server and client loading problem
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

im guessing your ipv4 address changed so you might have to re-portforward

Read full topic

Hey, for some reason, Yesterday I could connect to my server. yet today I can’t.

I checked to see on canyouseeme.org to see if my port was open and this is what i got…
